actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1362.

official_title: A bill to suspend the duty on live worms until the close of June 30, 1981.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1362) Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to eliminate the customs duty on the importation of live worms, if a product of Canada.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the duty on live worms until the close of June 30, 1981.
